title.narrative: DGC- Supporting the Kenya Constitutional Implementation Process

description.narrative: (Kenya): .USAID continues to partner with the Government of Kenya in developing comprehensive laws and policies required under the 2010 Constitution. The technical assistance focuses on formulation and review of a whole new set of legal, regulatory and policy instruments in all relevant ENRM, land and governance sectors at the two levels of government. This assistance has resulted in a number of laws and policies being formulated and enacted. FY 2016 funds will support the judiciary on election related dispute resolution, and strengthen the Kenya Law Reform Commission (KLRC) and other agencies to undertake policy formulation, implementation, monitoring, and impact review processes to ensure that reforms in governance, land, environment, and climate change sectors are aligned to the Constitution. .
